Contributors to our projects will get a chance to win:
- 3 Contributions: Amazon Vouchers (upto $10) + LambdaTest Licences (90 days)
- 5 Contributions or More: Amazon Vouchers (upto $20) + LambdaTest Licences (90 days).
Participants with four accepted pull/merge requests between October 1 and October 31 will receive a swag pack from Composio.

Every contributor whose PR is merged will receive GPU credits to use with dstack Sky for AI development!
also Bounties: Minor issue: $15, Major issue: $100, Advanced issue: $500
